data.message: You drawing a line in the Sand.. Fuck you Eminem!! Talk about Trump discriminating but you automatically exclude all the trump supporters.. And you been my favorite rapper since I was a kid back in the 90's.. You lost all my respect

replies.message: Same 😔
Yup!

Been listening since a kid and im 30. Why would he say that to his fans who have supported him for so long? Becaue we see things differently. What a disappointment. I literally started crying for some reason. Trump doesnt stand a chance bc of things like this. This is the division. The damn line in the sand. Trump isnt dividing us its this crap.
Anyone who is sad is just a crybaby lol
Patrick Dyminski Constantly posting stupid gif only shows you're incapable of thinking or speaking for yourself.
If you think that this is what is dividing us and not Trump, you need to pull your head out of the sand 😂😂

This is the problem. People are now so offended by others opinions. And what they believe in. Im really disappointed in this. Why does it have to be an issue of if you dont believe in what i believe then we cant be friends or a middle finger to the heart. So ridiculous.
Katie.. The dividing started with Obama. Are you some sort of moron?
buh bye.
Started with Obama? Please tell me how Eric Lowe. Give me a real answer. I'll be waiting to hear how Obama was such a divisive figure.

Eric Lowe Not as bad as the person who is pathetic enough to result to throwing insults. And I never said where it started, because that doesn't matter as much as the fact that the current government is doing absolutely nothing to attempt to fix it
Eric Lowe constantly? that's a gif btw not a meme, I've posted one, how's it 'constantly' retard

Actually all you liberal crybabies bitch about every little thing n try to divide everyone..Katie the liberals are the problem stop crying about every little thing ..Trump is your president stop acting like 4 yr olds having a tantrum!!
Katie Desjardins  what has Trump done that was racist???
Aha. I just trigger three in a row! I need a bigger net.
Fuckin righty.. ! Love Em but Im done with his garbage
Bye Felecia
Sam Borrelli I'm kind of curious how I'm acting like a 4 year old throwing a tantrum? Or is that just your response to everyone?
Bye
See what you did Sam Borrelli. You done triggered all these idiots into a frenzy.. Lol
No actually it's not..you think trump divides us but liberals crying about everything and protesting nonsense is the problem
Eric Lowe triggered? you seem to be the one triggered by a gif i posted on a freestyle video😂
